name: Arduino IDE
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 12 keyboard shortcuts found in the Arduino IDE

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 12 keyboard shortcuts found in the Arduino IDE

cards.title: General
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                           |
| ------------------ | -------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `S`         | Save                             |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `S` | Save as                          |
| `Ctrl` `N`         | Open a new sketch                |
| `Ctrl` `O`         | Open an existing sketch          |
| `Ctrl` `Q`         | Close the Arduino IDE            |
| `Ctrl` `R`         | Verify                           |
| `Ctrl` `U`         | Upload                           |
| `Ctrl` `F`         | Find                             |
| `Ctrl` `T`         | Adjust the alignment and spacing |
| `Ctrl` `/`         | Comment                          |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `M` | Open the serial monitor          |
| `Ctrl` `K`         | Open the sketch folder           |
